title: Serene Seaside Radisson Blu Visakhapatnam Escape with Daily Breakfast
description: Revel in the captivating coastal beauty of Visakhapatnam with a tranquil stay at the five-star Radisson Blu Resort Visakhapatnam, perfectly placed between pristine beaches. Blending elegance with modern luxury, the hotel boasts 99 stylishly designed rooms and villas, offering lush garden and Bay of Bengal vistas. Delve into Andhra Pradesh's vibrant culture by sampling the regional cuisine at two onsite restaurants, relax with a drink at the bar or dig into a delicious dessert from the pastry lounge. Go for a swim in the shimmering outdoor pool or detox with a revitalising treatment at the Samayaa World Spa.
offer_address: Survey No: 106, Dr NTR Beach Rd, Yendada, Rushikonda, Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh 530045, India

title: Andhra Pradesh Tranquil Godavari Riverfront Escape with Daily Breakfast
description:
In a land once ruled by ancient kings, dotted with lush green coconut groves, and India's second-longest river, the Godavari, flowing through, you'll find the beautiful RVR Sarovar Portico Dindi. Nestled on the banks of the River Godavari, in the lesser-known village of Dindi in Andhra Pradesh (a two-hour drive from Rajahmundry) RVR Sarovar Portico Dindi is a slice of tropical heaven in Konaseema. 

Built around a stunning pond brimming with exotic lilies, this luxurious retreat is your personal invitation to switch off and rejuvenate in the lap of nature. You'll find yourself surrounded by nothing except coconut plantations, serene backwaters, sparkling lakes, palm-fringed canals and blissful silence. You can easily access this Sarovar resort from major cities, including Hyderabad and Visakhapatnam, and experience the best of the rich Godavari belt of Andhra Pradesh.
offer_address: Dindi Village , Malikipuram Mandal, East Godavari District Malikipuram Mandal, Andhra Pradesh 533253
